Table of Contents

Class DatabaseWriter<TDatabase, TElement>

Namespace
Vts.MonteCarlo.IO
Assembly
Vts.dll

This is a base class to PhotonDatabaseWriter and CollisionInfoDatabaseWriter. It controls writing to a database of generic-type.

public class DatabaseWriter<TDatabase, TElement> : CustomBinaryStreamWriter<TElement>, IDisposable where TDatabase : Database<TElement>, new()

Type Parameters

TDatabase

Database of generic type Time

TElement

Generic database element
